titleStmt.title: Description of Maimonides' Commentary on the Mishnah of Seder Nashim, in Judeo-Arabic.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Or 4842: Maimonides' Commentary on the Mishnah of Seder Nashim, in Judeo-Arabic. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Marks of damp damage. Margins slightly injured.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Maimonides' Commentary on the Mishnah of Seder Nashim, in Judeo-Arabic.

msItem.title: Perush Seder nashim פרוש סדר נשים

collation.p: Quires of 10 leaves leaves each, with the exception of the first and the last, of 9 and 7 folios respectively. Signatures in Hebrew letters at the end of each quire.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 15th century. Maḥpots ibn Ma῾ots[?]: inscribed, folio 186v, with a date of 1713[1401].

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine title: 'Maimonides' Commentary Seder Nashim. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 4842.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Morris, Heller & Weiss: purchased by the British Museum on 14 November 1894: inscribed, [188v].
